fields.name: Question 1
fields.text: What is the first enzyme discovered by Alexander Flemming about immunity?

fields.name: Question 2
fields.text: When did Alexander Flemming get the Nobel Prize in in Physiology or Medicine ?

fields.name: Question 3
fields.text: To which school Einstein did not pass the entrance exam the first time?
fields.opt_one: Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Zurich
fields.opt_two: Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Lausanne

fields.name: Question 4
fields.text: Who wrote the first programming language?

fields.name: Question 5
fields.text: Whose tutor was Aristotle?

fields.name: Question 6
fields.text: Plato was a great philosopher and thinker, whose disciple was he?

fields.name: Question 7
fields.text: At Plato's Academy, the school founded in Athens by Plato, what was the phrase engraved at the entrance ?
fields.opt_one: No one enters here who is not a surveyor
fields.opt_two: No one enters here who is not a physicist
fields.opt_three: No one enters here who is not a philosopher
fields.opt_four: No one enters here who is not a fighter

fields.name: Question 8
fields.text: Who should denounce Jesus of Nazareth to the political and religious authorities of the time ?

fields.name: Question 9
fields.text: How did Socrates die after being condemned?
fields.opt_three: By absorbing a deadly poison, hemlock

fields.name: Question 10
fields.text: Which of these three philosophers is not one of Socrate disciples ?

fields.name: Question 11
fields.text: Whose student was Alexander the Great ?

fields.name: Question 12
fields.text: Which famous artist - painter, sculptor and goldsmith - agreed to take Leonardo on as an apprentice when he was 14 years old ?

fields.name: Question 13
fields.text: Moving away from his family, Confucius founded a school of wisdom that counts ?

fields.name: Question 14
fields.text: How is Confucius viewed?

fields.name: Question 15
fields.text: Which river did Julius Caesar cross with his legions in 49 BC on his way to Rome, a symbolic barrier between the territories he ruled as proconsul and the Roman Republic ?

fields.name: Question 16
fields.text: What is homer famous for?

fields.name: Question 17
fields.text: A legend suggests that Pythagoras participated in the Olympic Games. In what sport would he have shone ?

fields.name: Question 18
fields.text: What famous word did Archimed say ?

fields.name: Question 19
fields.text: Queen Victoria passed away in ...

fields.name: Question 20
fields.text: How old was Marie-Antoinette when she arrived in France?

fields.name: Question 21
fields.text: In what year was Elizabeth I of England born ?

fields.name: Question 22
fields.text: How did Anne Boleyn die ?

fields.name: Question 23
fields.text: What taboo did Sappho break ?

fields.name: Question 24
fields.text: What did Ramanujan mainly work on?
fields.opt_one: theta function, partition formulae and mock theta function
fields.opt_two: Alternative Theorems, Bieberbach's conjecture and Borel's law of zero one
fields.opt_three: Boundary theorem, Cauchy-Peano-Arzelà theorem and Quadratic reciprocity law
fields.opt_four: Quadratic reciprocity law, Cauchy-Peano-Arzelà theorem and Constant rank theorem

fields.name: Question 25
fields.text: Which country did Winston Churchill (1874-1965) lead during World War II?

fields.name: Question 26
fields.text: To which dynasty does Catherine II belong?

fields.name: Question 27
fields.text: On which river did Peter I The Great build his new capital, St Petersburg in 1703?

fields.name: Question 28
fields.text: Ivan the Terrible was also a builder, what did he build?
fields.opt_four: The Basilica of Basil the Blessed

fields.name: Question 29
fields.text: At what age did Jeanne d'arc hear voices ?

fields.name: Question 30
fields.text: Where was Hypatie born ?

fields.name: Question 31
fields.text: What conflict was Phillp II of Spain not involved in?

fields.name: Question 32
fields.text: Anne Boleyn was arrested on May 2, 1536. What was NOT one of the crimes she was charged with committing?

fields.name: Question 33
fields.text: Nefertiti's very name evokes her unusual position in history, to say nothing of the hopes that were held of her. What is the approximate meaning of her name?
fields.opt_one: See the daughter of the gods
fields.opt_two: The beauty of the world lasts forever

fields.name: Question 34
fields.text: During the war of which two cities did Marco Polo sit in jail?

fields.name: Question 35
fields.text: How old was Abraham when he first became a father?

fields.name: Question 36
fields.text: Upon what was Hitler's argument based when he claimed that Germany should control the Sudetenland of Czechoslovakia?
fields.opt_one: Former German ownership of the land
fields.opt_two: Many ethnic Germans lived in the area
fields.opt_three: Too strategic an area to be in the hands of enemies
fields.opt_four: A balance for land lost in Danzig, Poland

fields.name: Question 37
fields.text: Joseph Stalin was essentially the dictator of the U.S.S.R. How long was he in power?

fields.name: Question 38
fields.text: Mozart composed his first choral mass for 4 part choir, 2 vioins, viola, bass and organ at what age?

fields.name: Question 39
fields.text: In the book "Almagest", Claudius Ptolemy introduced 48 constellations, most of which are still recognised today. Which of the following constellations was one of those he introduced?

fields.name: Question 40
fields.text: Whose astronomical system did Nicolaus Copernicus prove wrong?

fields.name: Question 41
fields.text: What country was Kepler born in ?

fields.name: Question 42
fields.text: Tycho Brahe was the first to make ...
fields.opt_one: precise measurements of the orbit of Jupiter ?
fields.opt_two: precise measurements of the orbit of Mars ?
fields.opt_three: precise measurements of the orbit of Moon ?
fields.opt_four: precise measurements of the orbit of Neptune ?

fields.name: Question 43
fields.text: On what charge was Galileo arrested in Rome?

fields.name: Question 44
fields.text: What object did Sir Isaac Newton use to make these discoveries?

fields.name: Question 45
fields.text: How long was Tamerlan's reign?

fields.name: Question 46
fields.text: What does the title Genghis Khan mean?

fields.name: Question 47
fields.text: What was the one statue that Michelangelo carved his name on?
